reviews.review: One of the best VALVE games i have ever played 10/10

This is one of the most amazing games I have ever played! Full of challenges, humor and science geekiness, loved it from the beginning to the end!
As a great Witcher fan, i love portals !
Macht viel Spaß. Endlich mal ein "Shooter" bei dem es nicht ums sinnlose Ballern geht, sondern man denken muss um die Rätsel lösen zu können.

Hoy me lo acabo de pasar (Cuando hice esta reseña tenia 6 horas de juego) y es muy bueno, te lo recomiendo jugar si quieres pasar una tarde entretenida
[spoiler] GLaDOS es bien facil de vencer [/spoiler]

A unique and clever puzzle-based game that I suggest EVERYONE to play at least once in their life!
You truly won't forget it, EVER.
<SPOILER ALERT> The cake is a lie but I'm not lying when I say this one got me hooked to the portal series. 5/7 Highly recommended.
Das Spiel hatte ich nach etwa 5h durch. Macht Spaß sich da etwas reinzudenken und ist einfach humorvoll gemacht, würde es auf jeden Fall weiterempfehlen!
很棒的解密游戏，不会是V社著名的游戏，提示没有云存档哦！

Portal2入坑，在通关一年后来感受一下1。
两个小时也应该算是比较快通关了，关卡难度适中，但没出现像二代的卡关。
剧情太赞了，逃亡的时候让我浑身发冷。
顺便一提片尾曲《still alive》很好听，里面还有半条命黑山研究所的彩蛋！
赞。

Awesome game!  Puzzles are challenging after a while, but not impossible.  Simple controls, but so much you can do with them!  Highly recommend for anyone that likes puzzles.
Arguably the best Valve game ever made.

This is one that every year you can go back and enjoy all over again
With the whitty satire it's a keeper!
4个小时通关，有大半个钟卡在了第一关，以为AI说的手上拿了东西就不能通过激光门，所以拿了传送枪都不敢过，到处找路。还在墙壁和地面来回穿越，掉进无限循环，立马头晕。找到方法后还是很容易的，就是注意一定不要尝试无限循环穿越，真的很晕_(:з)∠)_

Ah, Portal. I got this game on sale, 90% off. $1. It was quite enjoyable. Great puzzle design, interesting [u]character[/u], semi-decent story, and one of the very, VERY few shooter games that I play. 7/10. Would I say it's worth $10? Probably not. Even so, if you're gonna be playing Portal 2, PLAY THIS FIRST. The 2 storylines are connected. Thank me later. Or don't. Your choice.
그냥 겜인줄알았는데 나중에 약간 공포분위기가 돌아서 신선했다

Portal is pretty much perfect. There's no real flaws with gameplay, and its story is the right length. 
My only qualm is in my opinion, the last level felt a bit long, but I was in a bit of a hurry when I was finishing it, so that might be the cause of that.
I definitely recommend Portal, its just a great game.
Its A Amazing Game And This Should make at least 3 games even know there is already a two MAKE A THREE!

O que dizer sobre Portal? Que é um jogo incrivel, apesar de suas limitações. A historia e os personagens são bastante cativantes. Apesar da historia não ter um inicio digno, isso acaba não importando quando está jogando. Ótimo grafico além de ser bastante leve e deve rodar na maioria dos pcs. é um jogo perfeito pra quem quer jogar nas horas vagas quando está sem internet.
Os portais são coisas incríveis mesmo
經典不敗!!!

游戏是好游戏~
然而我为了通关这个游戏，强忍了几个小时强烈的呕吐感，勉强自己在玩~
最后boss战的最后两个球我可耻地看了攻略~因为头晕目眩，根本没找到球的位置~

这是第一次，有一个游戏，能对我现实中的身体产生实际伤害……

这游戏TMD也太容易让人晕眩了吧~
我觉得医院可以考虑用这个游戏给吃了不干净东西的病人催吐……
我玩守望先锋十几个小时都没什么问题，玩这游戏一个小时就让我胃里翻江倒海……

我不知道喜欢这个游戏的玩家都有多么强大的运动神经~
如果有玩这个游戏一个小时以上，毫无晕眩的感的玩家请务必留言，让我知道这样的人类是存在的。
游戏很便宜，设定很有趣（游戏流程很短），你可以用传送门做一些很有趣的事情。
Давно играл во вторую часть и по какой-то неведомой причине не мог попасть на первую.И вот она появилась в стиме(у меня). Поиграл...Классно, но слишком легко...А так классно)

Why haven’t I played this before? I think it might just have become one of my all-time favourite games (along with the Talos Principle). It has [i]the most perfect[/i] blend of atmosphere, puzzles, storyline, story progression, voice acting and black humour. It’s an absolute gem of a game, albeit a little short - I’m very slow but it only took me 14 hours to complete on the first run. But no matter, it felt perfectly paced; not [i]too[/i] short.

It just gets better and better and more fun the more you progress. The pièce de résistance is the portal mechanics. Once you get the hang of how this works, particularly how to increase your path trajectory, it blows your mind as to the various possibilities for moving around. A bonus for me was that I didn’t need any walkthrough cheats (I usually need one or two in most games). All the puzzles will submit to logic if you can open your mind far enough.   I hope Portal 2 is as good – I bought both in a cheap bundle.  10/10 recommended. Brilliant!
One of the best games in my opinion

Ok, so this game is old, but I still think it is great.  Such a basic concept that is a lot of fun to play.  Yes, you can beat it in 2 hrs if you've ever played any portal game, but it's still a great game.  Portals 2 was awesome as well, I just hope they come up with a story line and continue the series.

El Primer juego de la franquicia de Portal, donde vas a sentir la tención como si estuvieras en el juego, logros fáciles y si se te hacen difíciles mirate algún Tutorial para tenerlo, así podes tener otro o el primer juego completado de tu perfil de Steam. Recomendado 10/10

Incrível,lembro da primeira vez que joojei,foi no meu Xbox 360 que ganhei de presente,
eu fiquei preso na 5 fase e deixei o jooj lá esquecido,na outra semana tentei joojar de novo
e zerei o jooj.
É triste que VALVe não faça mais jogos de hístoria,eles eram e continuam sendo tão bons,
VALVe é tipo o nerd preguiçoso da sala,sabe fazer tudo certo e com perfeição,mas não faz porque não quer.

 O jogo tem um clima meio "depressivo" e "cinzento" as músicas combinam perfeitamente com a ambientação,a hístoria é bem escondida mas conforme o tempo passa o jogo vai ficando mais interessante e você vai percebendo que tem algo de estranho acontecendo.

O gráfico não é lindo mas se adequa bem ao oque o jogo é,ou seja,já é o suficiente.
A jogabilidade é simples,você anda,gira a camera,abre portais e pega objetos.

Já a mecânica de portais é muito boa,a física é incrível,Source é Source.

Os Puzzles são muito bons,alguns requerem reflexos outros raciocínio e lógica.Nada impossivel,as vezes difícil,mas não impossivel.

MInhas notas finais são:

Hístoria: 9/10
Jogabilidade: 10/10
Puzzles: 9.5/10
Mecânicas: 11/10
Músicas: 8/10
Ambientação: 10/10
Duração: 2 horas,ou 3 se você for burro.                                                3?.....  lmao?
best
Incredible game.

Para personas que le gustan los juegos cortos, entretenidos, con una buena historia detrás y una jugabilidad sencilla, el portal os encantará! No los gráficos lo es todo en un juego, y este es uno de los mayores ejemplos, con unos gráficos muy simples es capaz de engancharte y hacerte acabar el juego en cuestión de dos días.

[h1]FINAL THOUGHT PS:
And when you're dead I will be
still alive.[/h1]

[h1]★★★★☆[/h1]
Loved it

This was a triumph.
I'm making a note here: HUGE SUCCESS.
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction.
Aperture Science
We do what we must
because we can.
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.
But there's no sense crying over every mistake.
You just keep on trying till you run out of cake.
And the Science gets done.
And you make a neat gun.
For the people who are still alive.
I'm not even angry.
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart.
And killed me.
And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because I was so happy for you!
Now these points of data make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time.
So I'm GLaD. I got burned.

Think of all the things we learned
for the people who are still alive.
Go ahead and leave me.
I think I prefer to stay inside.
Maybe you'll find someone else to help you.
Maybe Black Mesa
THAT WAS A JOKE.
HAHA. FAT CHANCE.
Anyway, this cake is great.
It's so delicious and moist.
Look at me still talking
when there's Science to do.
When I look out there, it makes me GLaD I'm not you.
I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are still alive.
And believe me I am still alive.
I'm doing Science and I'm still alive.
I feel FANTASTIC and I'm still alive.
While you're dying I'll be still alive.
And when you're dead I will be still alive.
STILL ALIVE

If by chance you are not familiar with this game in anyway, know that it is often, and rightfully, considered a classic. Now over 10 years old, the game has aged remarkably well. Despite my familiarity with the game, its slogans, and a part of its storyline, I actually had never played it before. I started it, finished it in two sittings, and quickly realized why it has long been so well liked. It is simply an amazing game. If you've gone this long without any spoilers to the game, I won't be the one to give anything away, so I'll keep this vague. You play a character that is inside Aperture Science Laboratories and you progress through increasingly difficult levels and solve the puzzles that each level has. Though this sounds simple, the game has great storyline, amazing voice acting, and a great atmosphere. It is immersive and easy to get caught up in the world. Though not really a scary game, simply due to some moments with stellar atmosphere and/or voice acting, there was more than once that I got genuinely creeped out. The puzzles are perfectly balanced between being accomplishable and being challenging. The ending is perfect and left me pleasantly surprised. Plus, the graphics are great for the game’s age. Don't be like me: stop procrastinating and waiting for the right time to get this game, just play it!! It is for sure 10/10 and I could not recommend it more.
Gioco carino per passare qualche oretta, il finale piuttosto in aspettato rompe la monotonia dei livelli precedenti!

Really awesome game. Great plot, and good difficulty. Worth your time and money.

Portal é um fodendo jogo muito foda!

O se resume em puzzles com uma historia por trás, com uma mecanica de portais que você pode atirar em qualquer parede, chão ou em qualquer lugar nranco. Os puzzles de inicio são bem simples porém, ao passar do tempo vão ficando um pouco mais dificeis, mas se você quiser desafio mesmo, ao terminar o jogo você libera as fases especiais que são os mesmos puzzles só que muito mais dificieis.
A historia em geral é boa, tendo uma grande reviravolta que todos nós sabemos e que virou meme entre a comunidade "O bolo é uma mentira", mas oque acontece se você não ganha o bolo, bom ai você joga para descobrir!
O jogo é curto, você zera ele em 3 horas, mas acredite são as 3 horas mais divertidas da sua vida, principalmente nas fases finais antes de chegar na Glados, adcionando mais uma mecânica muito util no puzzle final.
Bem como tudo não é uma maravilha, algumas falhas do jogo existem, como o uso excessivo de uma tecnica de velocidade, aquilo acaba de tornando massante e você começa a não aguentar mais fazer a mesma coisa quase sempre depois que ela é introduzida, outro defeito que pode ser facilmente ser ignorado, é a demora que você tem para pegar a portal gun completa, fora isso o jogo é perfeito.
Nota: -10 pela tecnica usada excessivamente -5 por um defeito facilmente ignorado, 85/100, Jogão da porra

Portal is a classic of puzzle games.
It is a game of physics-based puzzles and they are all really good. You are thrown into the game to solve puzzle after puzzle and pass to the next level.
I was impressed by how it looks even for today's standards; game mechanics and controls are very smooth.
The game is relatively short but very satisfying, I didn't want it to end. If a game manages that then is 100% recommended. I believe anyone that enjoys video games should play it at least once.
La base para muchos futuros videojuegos, con una gran historia, gráficos decentes (buenos para cuando salió) y una jugabilidad estupenda.
